chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: R
a: R
x0: R
n: nat

Goal:
head x0 (unif_part a b n) = a

Premises:
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
unif_part = fun (a b : R) (n : nat) => mkseq (fun i : nat => a + INR i * (b - a) / (INR n + 1)) (S (S n)) : R -> R -> nat -> seq R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
unif_part_bound : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), unif_part a b n = rev (unif_part b a n)
unif_part_sort : forall (a b : R) (n : nat), a <= b -> sorted Rle (unif_part a b n)
head_rcons : forall (x1 : ?T) (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), head x1 (rcons s t) = head t s where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
last_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), last x1 (rev l) = head x1 l where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
head_rev : forall (x1 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), head x1 (rev l) = last x1 l where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
head_map : forall (f : ?T1 -> ?T2) (s : seq ?T1) (x : ?T1), head (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (head x s) where ?T1 : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T2 : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
sorted_head : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, head x0 s <= nth x0 s i
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
Rminus_lt_0 : forall a b : R, a < b < -> 0 < b - a
Rle_minus_l : forall a b c : R, a - c <= b < -> a <= b + c
Rlt_minus_r : forall a b c : R, a < b - c < -> a + c < b
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Rle_div_l : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a / c <= b < -> a <= b * c
Rlt_div_r : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b < -> a < b / c
nth_cat : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s1 s2 : seq T) (n : nat), nth x0 (s1 ++ s2) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s1) then nth x0 s1 n else nth x0 s2 (ssrnat.subn n (size s1)))
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
nth_rev : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> nth x0 (rev s) n = nth x0 s (ssrnat.subn (size s) (S n))
rev_rev : forall l : seq ?T, rev (rev l) = l where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
interval_finite_subdiv_between : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal) (Hab : a <= b), let l := proj1_sig (interval_finite_subdiv a b eps Hab) in forall i : nat, (i < size l)%nat -> a <= nth 0 l i <= b
SF_lx_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h s) = fst h :: SF_lx s where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y) where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_make : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq ?T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq where ?T : [x0 : R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)

```coq
unfold unif_part.
rewrite head_map.
simpl.
unfold mkseq.
rewrite nth0.
reflexivity.
Qed.```
